item.title: Install Home Assistant on ESXi-ARM
item.description: One of the use cases for running ESXi-ARM in my home lab environment is running Home Assistant. Home Assistant is a great open-source platform for home automation. After assembling the Pi cluster (see my previous blog post ) and installing ESXi on ARM (ESXi-ARM) using the “Fling on Raspberry Pi ” documentation, it’s time to install Home Assistant.
